party_full_names: Граждани за европейско развитие на България
Вътрешна македонска революционна организация - Българско национално движение

party_answers.Question_Label: Social programs should be maintained even at the cost of higher taxes
The state should provide stronger financial support to unemployed workers
Government spending should be reduced in order to lower taxes
Taxation on the wealthiest part of the population should be increased
Retirement age should be raised in order to make the pension system more sustainable
The state should intervene directly to control the rising prices of basic commodities
The legalisation of same sex marriages is a good thing
The legalisation of the personal use of soft drugs is to be welcomed
Access to abortion should become more restricted
Gender quotas (e.g. a minimum share of positions to be filled by women) are to be welcomed
Immigrants from outside Europe should be required to accept our culture and values
Immigration into Bulgaria should be made more restrictive
The promotion of public transport should be fostered through green taxes (e.g. road taxing)
Renewable sources of energy (e.g. solar or wind energy) should be supported even if this means higher energy costs
As planned in the European Green Deal, there should be a Europe-wide ban on selling internal combustion engine vehicles by 2035
The EU should rigorously punish member states that violate the EU deficit rules
The EU should acquire its own tax raising powers
The single European currency (Euro) is a bad thing
On foreign policy issues the EU should speak with one voice
Asylum-seekers should be distributed proportionally among EU member states through a mandatory relocation system
The European Union should strengthen its security and defence policy
To fight the problem of illegal immigration, the European Union should take responsibility in patrolling its borders
European integration is a good thing
Individual member states of the EU should have less veto power
The EU should sanction member states whose governments undermine the rule of law
The EU should strenghten the regulation of Artificial Intelligence technology even if this means slowing down innovation
The EU should protect European farmers from external competition even if this leads to higher food prices
Bulgaria should increase military spending
The European Union should continue providing military aid, such as weapons and ammunition, to Ukraine
The European Union should be enlarged to include Ukraine
